usage.cn: 我的心是旷野的鸟，在你的眼睛里找到了天空。----泰戈尔
usage.eng: My heart， the bird of the wilderness， has found its sky in your eyes.

usage.cn: 天空没有翅膀的痕迹，而鸟儿已飞过
usage.eng: There are no trails of the wings in the sky, while the birds has flied away.

usage.cn: 人生就像愤怒的小鸟，当你失败时，总有几头猪在笑！
usage.eng: Life is like angry birds.There are always several pigs laughing when you lose.

usage.cn: 夏天的飞鸟，飞到我的窗前唱歌，又飞去了。秋天的黄叶，它们没有什么可唱，只叹息一声，飞落在那里。
usage.eng: Stray birds of summer come to my window to sing and fly away. And yellow leaves of autumn, which have no songs, flutter and fall there with a sign.
